divy5:8: anyatamo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ dūrādeva dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṁ vyāmaprabhālaṁkṛtaṁ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṁ jaṅgamamiva parvataṁ samantato bhadrakaṁ dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantamabhigamya gāthābhiḥ stotumārabdhah— suvarṇavarṇo nayanābhirāmaḥ prītyākaraḥ sarvaguṇairupetaḥ |
divy5:13: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti, pūrvavad yāvad bhagavata ūrṇāyāmantarhitāḥ |
divy5:14: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṁ papraccha— nānāvidho raṅgasahasracitro vaktrāntarānnṣkramitaḥ kalāpaḥ |
divy5:16: gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— vigatodbhavā dainyamadaprahīṇā buddhā jagatyuttamahetubhūtāḥ |
divy5:18: tatkālaṁ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṁ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām |
divy5:21: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṁ śrotuṁ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ (5)|
divy5:25: nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti |
divy5:26: dṛṣṭaste ānanda brāhmaṇo yena tathāgato gāthayā abhiṣṭutah? dṛṣṭo bhadanta |
divy5:27: asau anena kuśalamūlena viṁśatikalpaṁ vinipātaṁ na gamiṣyati |
divy5:28: kiṁ tu devāṁśca manuṣyāṁśca gatvā saṁsṛtya paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe stavārho nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati |
divy5:29: bhikṣavaḥ saṁśayajātāḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchanti—paśya bhadanta anena brāhmaṇena bhagavānekayā gāthayā stuto bhagavatā ca pratyekāyāṁ bodhau vyākṛta iti |
divy5:30: bhagavānāha—na bhikṣava etarhi, yathā atīte ’dhvani anenāhamekayā gāthayā stutaḥ, mayā ca pañcasu grāmavareṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
divy5:31: tacchṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta, bhāṣiṣye |
divy5:33: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo ’tīte ’dhvani vārāṇasyāṁ nagaryāṁ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṁ kārayati ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca |
divy5:37: gaccha, asya rājñaḥ kaccidanukūlaṁ bhāṣitaṁ kṛtvā kadācit kiṁcit śītatrāṇaṁ saṁpadyata iti |
divy5:40: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṁlakṣayati—kiṁ tāvadrājānaṁ stunomi āhosvid hastināgamiti |
divy5:43: gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— erāvaṇasyākṛtitulyadeho rūpopapanno varalakṣaṇaiśca |
divy5:47: tato rājā abhiprasanno gāthāṁ bhāṣate— yo me gajendro dayito manāpaḥ prītiprado dṛṣṭiharo narāṇām |
divy5:48: taṁ bhāṣase varṇapadāni tasya dadāmi te grāmavarāṇi pañca (7)|
divy5:51: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo ’sau hastināgaḥ, ahameva tena kālena tena samayena |
divy5:52: tadāpyahamanenaikayā gāthayā stutaḥ, mayā cāyaṁ pañcagrāmavareṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ |
divy5:53: etarhi anenaikagāthayā stutaḥ, mayāpi cāyaṁ pratyekabodhau vyākṛta iti |
